letters.description: Identify and document individual symptoms, triggers, and impact on daily life through detailed journaling and assessment tools.
Provide comprehensive education about fibromyalgia, its management, and self-advocacy strategies to empower clients.
Develop personalized lifestyle plans focusing on gentle exercise, sleep hygiene, stress reduction techniques, and pacing activities to manage energy levels and symptom flares.
Explore and implement evidence-based complementary therapies, such as mindfulness, gentle yoga, and nutritional adjustments, in collaboration with healthcare providers.
Employ cognitive behavioral techniques and emotional processing strategies to address pain catastrophizing, anxiety, and depression associated with fibromyalgia.
Support clients in setting achievable goals, rebuilding social connections, and pursuing meaningful activities to improve overall well-being and quality of life.
